value.0: Modify HCREXP - Note: This will not affect existing creatures.  Just new ones you place. (I think)
Change various sytems and factors associated with the Rest System
Nothing right now, I was mistaken
Ban the player till server restart.
Miscellaneous Factors (Familiars, Traps, Wandering, Store, etc)
Set a new Login Message - Speak the message when the World Maker arrives.
Set the number of round per level Summoned creatures last. - Speak the Number when the World Maker arrives
Set the time torches last (all other lights based on this) - Speak the number when the World Maker arrives.
HCREXP Factors (Level system, exp, costs, etc)
Set the bonus xp (default is 0) - Speak the number when the World Maker arrives.  NOTE: This may have no effect.
Set base exp (default is 300) - Speak the number when the World Maker arrives NOTE: This may have no effect.
Set the level players start at - Speak the Number when the World Maker appears.
Set the cost of training - Speak the number when the World Maker arrives
Toggle PWEXP system status (needs HCREXP to work)
Set New Rest Interval - Speak the number when the worldmaker appears, she will set it for you.
Toggle HUNGERSYSTEM status (need to eat and dring regulary)
Set the chance for Deity Resurrection (default 5) - Speak the number when the World Maker arrives.
SERVER Factors (DMRESERVE, PK, Locking Server, Player DM etc)
Set a Player DM -  Speak the players Public CDKey to set it.
Set the max number of PK's allowed - Speak the number when the World Maker arrives.
Set a reserve number for DM's - Speak the number when the World Maker arrives
Set MULTICHAR - Speak the number when the World Maker arrives
Restore all factors to my default settings.
